<title level="1" right="Rules">[Detecting Snares](/Rules.aspx?ID=3317)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 297 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Detecting Snares Creatures can detect snares they aren't already aware of as they would any [trap or hazard](/Rules.aspx?ID=2846), using the creator's Crafting DC as the snare's Stealth DC. If your proficiency rank is expert or better in Crafting, only creatures actively searching can find your snares
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
